long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A little extension to redact data in webpages. 

Ptero Redactyl (like the dinosaur, pterodactyl, get it?) will redact email addresses from webpages by replacing them with black boxes so that you can screenshot pages without leaking PII (personally identifiable information).

What can you redact:
- Email Addresses
- Highlighted text
- Text you input

For more redactable data types, email me! Thanks!

Last updated: 2/23/2024
